Text: Mirrormaster82 you rock for uploading these Dark Tower series together is awesome...some of the best art ever...Thanks!!
Thank you very much. will seed.

Is anyone else missing a page or two (I'm guessing) from chapter 1? The end of page 17 ends with Sheemie seeing "something" and is about to explain but then page 18 begins with Roland talking as if he just heard Sheemie's story. Also, just for clarification, I'm using CDisplay to view the chapter.
Oh, forgot to mention: AWESOME UPLOAD! I loved the DT series when it originally came out and glad they decided to fill plot holes from the books.
